name: warrior
short_description: Skilled combatant or strategist typically relying on his heavy armor and weapons to cut down their enemies. His training gives him unique abilities.

name: mage
short_description: A keeper of arcane secrets and forgotten knowledge, the wizard manipulates magic and spells with cunning.

name: rogue
short_description: A thief, assassin or stealthy character who has a knack for picking out his enemies weaknesses and exploiting them.

name: ranger
short_description: One who uses a unique blend of wilderness knowledge and martial ability to be a deadly hunter, with a bow, a pet or melee weapons.
